page.title: 10BEACONSIDE C of E SCHOOLS
page.content: Both schools are open-plan.There are 202 children in the{Infant {School,}9 teachers and 8 classes, on average there are 27 in a class,1 part-time teacher and a part-time secretary.198 children have school lunch,2 go home,2 have sandwiches. School starts at 9.00 and ends at 3.15pm. 310 children in the{Junior {School,}12 teachers, 11 classes and about 31 in a class. 3 part-time teachers and a part-time secretary.245 have school dinners,60 have sandwiches and about 5 go home. For{lessons}we have maths,language,Reading 360,topic P.E.,craft,R.E.,art and music. We have outdoor activities like swimming,games & outdoor pursuits. Other activities include gymnastics & table tennis. School starts at 9.00am and ends at 3.30pm. We have hymn practice weekly and assembly daily.
